learning_outcomes.description: Analyse results, create reports and discuss findings
Collect, analyse and organise information and convey that information clearly and fluently
Make recommendations and improvements to the field
Review literature and design a research project using MRI

assessments.task_description: Project proposal must include aim, justification, method, equipment and bibliography.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: PowerPoint presentation of the project. This should be presented to a couple of UQ staff members. The PowerPoint presentation can be completed in person or over zoom. A critique form will be completed by at least two staff members.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Please email the presentation and the critic forms to the course coordinator.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Submit an absolute maximum of 15000 words.  Should follow standard format:

  •  Introduction, which concludes with aim and hypothesis
  • Literature review
  • Method
  • Results
  • Discussion and Imaging Portfolio
  • Conclusion
  • Bibliography
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.topic:
Powerpoint presentation of project

Begin to prepare Powerpoint of project. This should be presented to a group of your peers.

learning_activities.topic:

Begin to prepare a dissertation as per the guidelines under Section 5. Assessment
